comments:
20050925

Surround the body ('g.drawImage(...)') of the if-statement:
class E {
	public void paint(Graphics g) {
		if (g != null)
			g.drawImage(null, 0, 0, 0, 0, null);
	}
}

-> Use ASTNodes.isControlStatementBody to detect if a block has to be introduced
for a statement.
